// Cold Front (curated)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / controller): "A new 750 RPM SMG with low stability."
dimwishlist:item=1506719573&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2387244414,1774574192

// Trophy Hunter (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "[...] a 50 zoom puts it in line with Tatara Gaze, Elegy with the SSO-08 scope, and Aachen with Ambush. If those snipers feel fine to you then this might feel right at home." Recommended MW: Handling.
dimwishlist:item=4166221755&perks=1840239774,3142289711,972757866,957782887

// Pyroclastic Flow (curated / controller)

dimwishlist:item=1289324202&perks=332773068,2985827016,2010801679,1890422124

// Pyroclastic Flow (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP rockets aren’t in the best place anymore, but these and the Hakke frames all make a case because they can get a variety of different perks not needing to have Tracking Module as one of their trait perks." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.
dimwishlist:item=1289324202&perks=332773068,1996142143,706527188,1275731761
dimwishlist:item=1289324202&perks=3809316345,1996142143,706527188,1275731761

// Point of the Stag (curated / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / controller): "With hush being the hip-fire champ I firmly believe that this will be the ADS champ. If you happen to take any damage before your first shot then Eye of the Storm will magnetize your next shot to their head and you’ll get Archer’s Tempo to make your next shot just that much faster." Recommended MW: Draw Time.
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,2866798147,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,201365942,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,2866798147,699525795
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,201365942,699525795
